mapper.select: select m.* from menu as m left join identity_menu as ident_menu on m.id = ident_menu.menu_id left join identity as ident on ident_menu.identity_id = ident.id left join user_identity as us_ident on ident.id = us_ident.identity_id left join user as us on us.id = us_ident.user_id where us.id = #{userId}
